text: Jiří Tomáš Kotalík (14 February 1951 - 2 July 2020) was a Czech art historian. He was born in Prague. From 1997 to 2003 and again from 2010 to 2014, he was the Rector of the Academy of Fine Arts, Prague. A professor, he also taught at the Film and TV School of the Academy of Performing Arts in Prague. Kotalík died on 2 July 2020 in Prague, aged 69.Zemřel emeritní rektor a dlouholetý pedagog AVU, doc. Jiří Tomáš Kotalík ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech historians Category:Writers from Prague
title: Jiří T. Kotalík
